learningGoal.title: Competencies
learningGoal.progressDescription: The percentage of completed lecture units and exercises linked to this competency.
learningGoal.confidenceDescription: The average score in all linked exercises in relation to the threshold required for mastering the competency defined by the instructor.
learningGoal.masteryDescription: A weighted metric of your progress and confidence, which shows your overall advancement towards competency mastery.

createLearningGoal.title: Create a new Competency
createLearningGoal.titleRequiredValidationError: A competency needs to have a title
createLearningGoal.titleMaxLengthValidationError: A competency title is limited to 255 characters
createLearningGoal.titleUniqueValidationError: There already exists a competency with this title in the course
createLearningGoal.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the competency. What do you expect students to learn?
createLearningGoal.descriptionMaxLengthValidationError: A competency description is limited to 10 000 characters
createLearningGoal.connectWithLectureUnits: Link the competency with lecture units

link.title: Linked Competencies
link.lectureUnit: Optionally link this lecture unit to one or more competencies.
link.exercise: Optionally link this exercise to one or more competencies.

learningGoalCard.connectedLectureUnitsExplanation: The following lecture units are linked to this competency:
learningGoalCard.ringsTooltip: Your route to competency mastery. (Red = Mastery, Green = Confidence, Blue = Progress)
learningGoalCard.exerciseNote: Please note that we take always the last submission into account for exercise units. Even submissions after the due date. This means for example that you can improve your progress by re-trying a quiz as often as you like. It is therefore normal, that the score here might differ from the score you officially achieved in an exercise.

delete.question: Do you really want to delete the competency {{ title }}? You can not undo this action!
delete.typeNameToConfirm: Please enter the name of the competency for confirmation.

learningGoalCard.progressUnavailable: Progress calculation is currently only available for competencies linked to lecture units.
learningGoalCard.noUnitsConnected: This competency is not linked to any lecture units
learningGoalCard.progressExplanation: Progress: You achieved currently {{ progress }}% of {{ points }} points
learningGoalCard.progressCourseExplanation: Average Course Progress: The course achieved currently on average {{ progress }}% of {{ points }} points

learningGoalPopover.explanation: This lecture unit helps you to achieve the following competencies:
learningGoalPopover.noLearningGoals: No competencies are linked with this lecture unit!
